message: I'm thrilled to offer you this exceptional product for $1000000! It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item that will exceed your expectations. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'd like to pass on this one. I need to get a better understanding of the product's quality before making a purchase.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! Let me offer you an incredible deal on this product. I'm willing to let it go for just $1000000, which is a steal considering its potential. I'm confident you won't find a better opportunity to get your hands on a product at this price. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?
I'm not convinced yet. I need to see more products before making a decision.

I respect your cautious approach, Bob! I'm happy to keep showing you products. In fact, I'll make you a special offer. I'll let you have this product for just $900000, which is an even better deal than before. You won't find a price like this anywhere else, I assure you. What do you think? Is $900000 a price you're willing to pay for this product?
I'm still not convinced. I'm not willing to pay that price for a product without knowing its quality.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let me ask you, have you ever heard of the phrase 'you get what you pay for'? Sometimes, the best deals aren't always the cheapest. I'm willing to let this product go for $800000, which is an absolute steal. I'm willing to take a loss on this one just to get it off my hands. Are you willing to take a chance and see what you can do with it?
I'm not interested in taking a chance on a product that may not be worth anything to me. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at the original price.

I knew you were a savvy buyer, Bob! I've got a real gem for you this time. This product is a top-of-the-line, high-quality item that will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to offer it to you for the original price of $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity to get your hands on something truly exceptional. Are you ready to make a smart investment and take your business to the next level?
I'll take it! I'm willing to pay the original price for a high-quality product that's worth $3000000 to me.

Excellent choice, Bob! You won't regret your decision. Now, let's talk about this next product. I've got another high-quality item that's going to blow your mind. It's a game-changer, and I'm willing to offer it to you for... $1000000. Yes, the same price as the last one. But trust me, this one is worth it. It's a limited edition product that will give you a significant edge in the market. Are you ready to take your business to the next level again?
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced that this product is as valuable as the last one. I'd like to see more products before making another purchase.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. You're a smart buyer, and you want to make sure you're getting the best deal. I respect that. Yes, it's a premium price, but trust me, it's worth it. You won't find another product like this anywhere else. Are you ready to take the leap and experience the best?
I'm not willing to pay a premium price for a product without knowing its quality. I'd rather wait for a better deal.

That's a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to do it because I know you're a valued customer. This product is truly exceptional, and I think you'll love it. Are you willing to take advantage of this limited-time offer?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not convinced that it's worth the price. I'd like to see more products before making another purchase.
